EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1338903951.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1338903951.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kym, You are very welcome, thank you for the update. As you review the information, if you have any questions for me please do not hesitate to reach out to me and I will be happy to speak with you again. I look forward to hearing from you later this summer! Have a great week, Nicolette From: Kym M Cadle [mailto:kcadle@pureambitionconsulting.com] Sent: Monday, June 04, 2012 4:55 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Follow Up Hi Nicolette, Thanks for your note. I am definitely still interested but haven't had time to fully determine if this is something I'm ready to sign up for. I am still in start up mode with my business and am very focused on landing new clients. I will follow through on the further info you sent this month and hope to have an update for you mid July based on my schedule. Best, Kym On May 29, 2012 at 2:08 PM Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote: --> --> --> --> --> --> Dear Kym, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding MBO Partners. I know you had expressed interest in using our services. Any update would be great and I look forward to hearing from you. Regards, Nicolette Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com>and permanently delete the e-mail and files. </html
